events.message: Policyholder reported a car collision that occurred on the highway resulting in vehicle damage.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing initial details and damage description.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims was assigned to manage the customer's case.
The insurance company formally acknowledged receipt of the car accident claim and provided next steps.
Requested police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and insurance documents to proceed with the case.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including accident report and repair estimates.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted materials and contacting involved parties for details.
Investigation completed confirming fault and validating damage costs consistent with the report.
A settlement offer based on the estimated repair costs and coverage limits was sent to the customer.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and appreciated the quick response.
Claim approval was granted following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement.
Processed and issued payment to customer to cover vehicle repair costs in a timely manner.
The claim case was officially closed after payment disbursement and final confirmation from the customer.
